wikipedia_page.main: Geoffrey Tattersall, QC, is a former Judge of Appeal in the Isle of Man.  He is also a member of the Byrom Street Chambers, Manchester and 22 Old Buildings, London.  He was educated at Manchester Grammar School (1958 – 66) and Christ Church Oxford and called to Lincoln's Inn in 1970.  He was appointed a Queen's Counsel in 1992 and a Deputy High Court Judge in England in 2003.  He is also the Vicar General of the Diocese of Sodor and Man.
